Soup.description: CHINESE VEGETERIAN SOUP MADE WITH MIXED VEGETABLES, GARLIC, GINGER, SOYA SAUCE, GROUND PEPPER & FEW OTHER PANTRY INGREDIENTS, THIS SUPER FLAVORFUL MANCHOW SOUP IS SERVED WITH CRISPY FRIED NOODLES.

Grilled and Tandoor.title: TANGDI KEBAB
